org.jetel.util.compile

Class DynamicJavaClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.compile.DynamicJavaClass

  • public final class DynamicJavaClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for dynamic compiling of Java source code. Offers instantiating of compiled code.
    Since:
    31st May 2010

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Object instantiate(java.lang.String sourceCode)
      Instantiates class written in given source code.

      Instantiates class written in given source code and attempts cast it to given type.
      static java.lang.Object instantiate(java.lang.String sourceCode, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader, java.net.URL... compileClassPath)
      Instantiates a class present within the given Java source code.
      static java.lang.Object instantiate(java.lang.String sourceCode, Node node)
      Instantiates class written in given source code.

      • instantiate

        public static java.lang.Object instantiate(java.lang.String sourceCode,
                           java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                           java.net.URL... compileClassPath)
        Instantiates a class present within the given Java source code.
        Parameters:
        sourceCode - the Java source code with a class to be instantiated
        classLoader - the class loader to be used, may be null
        classPathUrls - the array of additional class path URLs, may be null
        Returns:
        instance of the class present within the source code
        Throws:
        LoadClassException - if instantiation of the class failed for some reason
